name: AutoslideSlidingDoor
0:
”Alexa, tell Auto slide to lock”
”Alexa, tell Auto slide to change to automatic mode”
”Alexa, ask Auto slide to report”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: auto slide
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Autoslide skill for Alexa enables you to securely control your sliding doors with voice commands.

NOTE: An Autoslide AutoPlus hub is required. AutoPlus is sold separately.

To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your Autoslide account.

Simply ask Alexa on your Alexa enabled device:
"Alexa, tell Autoslide to lock."
"Alexa, tell Autoslide to change to automatic mode"
"Alexa, ask Autoslide to report"

NOTE: Whisper mode is available in Alexa when enabled in the Alexa app settings under Voice Responses

For a full list of voice commands and FAQ please visit the Autoslide skill guide at aus-prd-web.unikey.com/alexa-guide

Get Started:

1. Using the Alexa mobile app find and enable the Autoslide Slding Door skill.

2. You should be taken to a login screen. Login using your Autoslide credentials.

3. You should now see a list of your doors that are available for voice control. In order for a door to be listed it must be connected to the internet via an Autoslide AutoPlus.

4. Add a checkmark to each of the doors you want to be able to control by voice. If you do not select any doors you will not be able to finish enabling your skill.

5. Press the button at the bottom to be taken to a review page.

6. Review and confirm your selected doors.

7. If you do not already have an Alexa voice profile and security PIN setup you will be prompted to set those up. These are required for actions that unlock your doors.
